titles: Work for a cooper being an answer to a libel, written by Thomas Wynne the cooper, the ale-man, the quack, and the speaking-Quaker : with a brief account how that dissembling people differ at this day from what at first they were / by one who abundantly pities their ignorance and folly.
author: Jones, William, fl. 1679-1710.
publisher: Printed by J. C. for S. C. ...,
notes: Written by William Jones of North Wales.  Cf. Halkett and Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Wynne, Thomas. --  Antiquity of the Quakers proved.
Society of Friends --  England --  Controversial literature.
